website_summaries.verdict: Full of the natural quality you've come to expect from Burt's Bees products.
pros: Includes honey, which gives fur a natural shine
Soothes itchy skin and clears up dry patches
Rinses out easily, leaving soft, easy to brush fur
cons: Conditioner has little to no scent, doesn't combat strong odor

website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice if you are looking for a reliable oatmeal formula and don't mind that it's a bit weak when it comes to lathering.
pros: Has a lot to offer dog owners, including its all-natural formula, reasonable price, and trusted brand
Includes honey and beeswax for added soothing and moisturizing
cons: Doesn't lather very well, but this doesn't seem to affect its cleansing or skin-soothing action

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap
customer_reviews.text: Great soap rinses clean and has no added smells very smooth. Wouldn’t recommend for dogs that have allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhala

customer_reviews.title: She still smelt like a dirty dog
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to using this new shampoo and conditioner on my dog. But the shampoo didn't really suds up at all, it was too thick and I had to use a large amount to wash her. Then about one hour after her bath, when she was mostly dry I sniffed her, gross! She still smelt like a dirty dog. I've been bathing her one a month for 12 years and this has never happened before! I'm so disappointed in Bert's Bees. I will not be buying any of their products again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Langevin

customer_reviews.title: Caused itching!
customer_reviews.text: Large size for the price. Cleans well. Update: My dog was itching like crazy and is losing fur after first use. Have used this shampoo before- no issues. She was rinsed well, lukewarm water-no other products used. Bottle did not have a foil seal and was runnier than usual. So questioning the integrity of product recieved.
customer_reviews.author: Stëph Måe

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my Maltese bright and soft, very gentle as he has sensitive skin, and it smells great. Sometimes I just pick him up to sniff him. I wish it weren't so thin, though, as I lose a lot out of my hand and the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: K & A Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Happy Bathing
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a shampoo that doesn't irritate my dog's very sensitive skin!! Not only does it not cause redness or itching, it cleans his fur, lathers great, and rinses really easy. This is on a short haired German Shepherd. I also tried the conditioner, because I loved the shampoo so much, but didn't find the grooming experience any better for it.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Falco

customer_reviews.title: Leaves their hair feeling soft
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pet shampoo that doesn't contain perfumes and other dangerous ingredients. After using on my dogs, I ordered the one for cats (haven't built up my courage to attempt bathing them just yet!). There was no soap residue left on my dogs and it rinsed out easily. It did dry their skin a tad but not that bad and that may be due to my using diatomaceous earth a few days prior to bathing them. Their hair felt softer than I expected. Without perfume they don't smell "good" but that's better for them, as perfume is for humans, not a dog's sensitive nose. A little pricey but overall I'd recommend this product and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Bren LeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo! My dog was really itchy. We live in California and the heat was getting to her because she has a lot of fur. I had used a shampoo that turned out to be very bad for her skin so I quickly got this one, gave her a bath and literally instantly, right after her bath I could tell she was relieved. No more incessant itching or biting. She's calm and happy and so now I am too. Happy dog, happy life:))
customer_reviews.author: J. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Best dog shampoo I’ve used.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shampoo because my dog has sensitive skin, but now I buy it for my self as well..... no I’m not using the shampoo on my self... it’s the smell. The scent this shampoo is so much better than others I have used. It’s subtle and my dog still smells like a (clean) dog after using it. If strong scents bother you and you don’t want to be attacked by the smell of eucalyptus every time your pup tries to snuggle I highly recommend this shampoo. Also, yes this works great for dogs with sensitive skin. My dog spends considerably less time scratching and has not gotten any hotspots or irritated areas when we use this shampoo regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Wes B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mild Soap
customer_reviews.text: We use this as an alternate shampoo for our German Shepherds. The other shampoo is medicated because they have sensitive skin. Burt's Bees is mild smelling and keeps their fur soft and shiney!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 paws recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My pup has VERY sensitive skin so I’ve used a variety of different shampoos. He’s allergic to everything, so I have to be cautious with ingredients. This one by far is my favorite! It has a light but sweet scent and doesn't make my dog super itchy after bathing. (Hopefully it soothes him). I’d recommend for other dogs with skin issues/sensitivity/allergies.
customer_reviews.author: FMS

customer_reviews.title: no overpowering scent! gentle and moisturizing dog shampoo
customer_reviews.text: most dog shampoos have a very strong perfume scent so i wanted to find something that was not so over powering. if you think about how dogs have such a powerful sense of smell most of the dog shampoos on the market must make them miserable. this shampoo is gentle and moisturizing and has a nice lather. my dogs have such a shiny soft coat now and don't mind getting a bath...in fact i shampoo them every other week now and i think it cuts down on their shedding a lot! (i have 2 Puggles).
customer_reviews.author: Favdoggy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I can't understand why this gets such good reviews. I tried really hard to like it. But it smells kind of plasticy, like crayons, which didn't leave my dog smelling fresh. The shampoo doesn't suds up well, doesn't spread well, and didn't do anything for my dogs coat. As for the conditioner. Such a waste. Again. It doesn't spread. It doesn't condition. It doesn't detangle and it doesn't smell good.
customer_reviews.author: V.J.P

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We love Burts Bees and have multiple dog and baby products! We had previously been using the Burts Bees anti-itch. I think it did help one of my dogs (the one with incessant paw licking); it didn’t totally cure it but it did relieve it. But my other dog got an allergic reaction (which she normally does from most dog shampoos). This one is gentle enough where it doesn’t aggravate her. Very light fragrance too which is important for sensitive sniffers. For the price, it’s the best you can get in dog shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: annette828

customer_reviews.title: Non-irritating
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my pitbull who has a topic dermatitis. He had a skin infection from biting and was on anabiotic’s and losing his hair. I started using this while he was healing to keep it clean because his normal dog shampoo was irritating his skin even more. I bought it together with the conditioner. I am very happy with The product it helps keep them clean, didn’t irritate his skin, and probably help soothe it a little bit. Since he was already on medication I don’t know about the soothing for sure. But just the fact that it didn’t irritate him makes it a win in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bates

customer_reviews.title: Cured my dog's itching
customer_reviews.text: I kept thinking my dog had a flea, she would keep scratching the same area. I used Sentry Natural Flea shampoo and I tried the Hartz version that is sold at supermarkets. Then I tried this Burt's Bee's and almost immediately and never again does my dog have an itch around her tummy area. If she gets a flea I'll use Sentry again.
customer_reviews.author: Frank1701a

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: The scent isn’t very strong, and it doesn’t lather great but that’s how most “natural” products are. I do not mind it not lathering well because I feel that natural products such as this one do a much better job at cleaning the hair regardless of the fact that it doesn’t lather well. My only complaint is the scent, it’s almost non existent and I love for my pup to have a good smell to her because she plays hard outside and gets that “been outside” pup smell on occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's the combination of this shampoo and my dog in particular, but the scent of this is odd and vaguely unpleasant right after the bath. I can't even really describe what it smells like. Left her fur nice and soft, and she has sensitive skin and didn't seem bothered by it, but the immediate "after" smell is not great. Still using it, you just have to put up with a few hours before it wears off. I love Burt's Bees and was happy to see something for my dog but, yuck. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Katelizt

customer_reviews.title: I strongly do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have used a few different brands of dog shampoo that are marketed toward dogs with sensitive skin. This shampoo caused my dog to break out in rashes. I do not recommend this to anyone who has a dog with sensitive skin, nor do I recommend it for anyone who has a dog who has normal skin.
customer_reviews.author: Moses M

customer_reviews.title: Soft and clean for days
customer_reviews.text: We are surprised at how well this product suits our dog. We have used other good shampoos before but the softness, clean, shine and non-odor that resulted from this shampoo is unsurpassed. The clean lasts much longer as well. We have a beagle whose coat near the tail can be wiry, but with this shampoo even those hairs were palpably softer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a terrible soap but could have a better, cleaner scent
customer_reviews.text: Made my boy very soft. There is almost no scent and he smelled like a gross wet dog until he dried. Once dried he smelled cleaner but didn't have the clean dog smell we get with other natural soaps. Wish it had more honey scent. It did lather and rinse nicely.
customer_reviews.author: SamF

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Takes a lot of water to get it to soap up on my dog and harder to rinse out than other shampoos I've used. Not much of a scent. Doesn't seem to bother my dog's skin (which is sensitive). Kind of pricey, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin issues
customer_reviews.text: My dog has very sensitive skin, and a lot of allergies, and I was specifically told to get an oatmeal shampoo by my vet. This didn't seem to bother her skin at all, and it smells great! I had to use a lot on my larger dog though, so I wish it was a slightly bigger bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Dani C

customer_reviews.title: Good for the dogs
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for my fur baby. She stopped scratching which is a result of dry skin. The scent of the conditioner is good and not too strong or overwhelming. Finally we found a good product that agrees with our dogs sensitive skin. Will definitely recommend this conditioner. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Burt's Bees dog shampoo has me buzzing for joy
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old Yorkie had dry skin. She would scratch herself raw. But I knew how much I liked Burt's Bees product, so I thought I would try their oatmeal dog shampoo. She is so soft and fluffy and no itchin. Thanks Burt's Bees for another great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cenla Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo! It has a gentle scent, not overwhelming. It also both lathered well and rinsed easily. My dog looked beautiful after one use, her coat is bright and fluffy! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: M O

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no smell, but my dog is very soft!
customer_reviews.text: Made my dog extremely soft and he did not have any type of reaction- though my dog doesn’t have sensitive skin so that’s not saying much I guess. I just wish there was a smell to it... it’d be perfect if it made him smell amazing. But it doesn’t, it doesn’t smell like anything at all. The good part of that is that he does not smell like wet dog after either.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzi Courtney

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, but not for us...
customer_reviews.text: This product is safe, but doesn't smell great and does not make our fur baby soft and silky. We use earthbath which smells wonderful, environmentally and puppy safe AND makes our little guy so soft and fluffy!
customer_reviews.author: Boston

customer_reviews.title: Leaves pets hair dry and coarse
customer_reviews.text: Not very satisfied with this line of dog soap. It's nice if your dog has allergies. Its not very sudsy and has no smell. My dog didnt smell very clean after using this and his hair felt dry and coarse.
customer_reviews.author: sambo1234

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I don't hate the product, but it's not what I would expect from Burt's. My dog smelled like a wet dog after her bath(not a fresh clean dog) but that scent faded as she fully dried. She didn't smell good, but not bad either. She stunk again on day two. Her fur was super shiny and both shampoo and conditioner though.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Greene

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Was slightly disappointed but only because of the raving reviews you typically see for this company. Worked fine to get the job done. Didn’t get foamy when trying to wash or leave a good scent. Probably best for pups with very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Zeller

customer_reviews.title: It rinses so much easier (it isn't "gummy") like other shampoos and seems to make the fur/fine hair ...
customer_reviews.text: The only dog shampoo I'll ever use again. Having a Yorkshire, his skin is prone to drying out. Oatmeal shampoo has always been handy for us to bathe him with, and recently after finding this here on Amazon, I decided to give it a try. Wow. It rinses so much easier (it isn't "gummy") like other shampoos and seems to make the fur/fine hair easier to dry.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: def keep this in stock
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's pretty great. Gave my dogs a nice, soft and shiny coat. I had to use A LOT! Even for my short-haired pup. For my lab, I used more than half the bottle to get all of his fur covered. The product is relatively cheap, and gave great results, so I'll def keep this in stock for my stinky butts :D
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Almost no scent
customer_reviews.text: Overall a fine shampoo with a major issue. The scent is almost non existent. In fact my dog smelled worse after getting a bath than before. However for dogs with sensitive this should work great. My dog had no problems using this shampoo and her fur was very soft afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: DreWolfRS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way with this stuff, it lathers up great! Really puts in work in cleaning off my dogs, but is nice and gentle on their sensitive skin. The smell of the oats and honey is actually pretty nice when you wash them, but of course that is not a lingering scent - they'll just smell nice and plainly clean afterwards. It leaves their fur so soft and pettable!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Puppy is soft, but no scent
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is so soft after using this, but there is no scent to it, so he still smells like a wet dog after we use it. If you don’t care a bit scent, it’s a great product
customer_reviews.author: C.t.

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo for a toy poodle
customer_reviews.text: I have a toy poodle and I use this shampoo on him every other week. This shampoo is gentle and has a very mild smell. This does the job cleaning his hair: it lathers well and rinses out cleanly. It doesn't seem to bother him on his face. I use this withas a conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: David Koski

customer_reviews.title: Cleans my dog, not much of a scent
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this shampoo on my dog for about a year and I feel like it does an adequate job of getting he clean. There isn’t much of the scent and it doesn’t irritate her skin. I bought another bottle and plan to use it again for another year!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gribb

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: A terrific product . Inexpensive , low suds , squeaky clean doggie ! But doesn’t help w the tangles .
customer_reviews.author: Jules Heerlein

customer_reviews.title: Product was damaged because of nothing in box to protect them. Price was fantastic! I love Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I love these products but the shipping was awful. There was nothing in the box to protect my items and 2 of them leaked as you can see. Price was super too. My sweet pup gets a bath every week.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: No scent. Very good shampoo for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo has made my Chihuahua's fur softer than I ever felt it be. This is after just one bath in it. The first time I used it. I will be using this from now on. It looks like he is enjoying it too. So I'm sold on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, clean, and great smelling
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand as they’re responsible and usually have great products. My pups are super soft and smell great after using this. My only complaint is it feels like we have to use more of it to get a good lather going which means the product won’t last as long. Other than that, great dog shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Burts dog shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Works Great not harmful to the dogs eyes ..My dog so sensitive..Doesnt she look Beautiful ?love the burts dog shampoo .
customer_reviews.author: Tamilasami

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a lot of the soap is missing from the ...
customer_reviews.text: It was clear that some soap came out of this bottle and then the bottle was just wrapped in plastic. I feel like a lot of the soap is missing from the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great for short hair, Bad for long hair; causes matting.
customer_reviews.text: Love this for dogs with short hair! With the longer haired dogs, I noticed a lot more matting would occur, even if paired with a detangler. Would not recommend for any dog that mats easily including (but not limited to): schnauzers, poodles, doodles, malteses, bichons, havanese, shih tzus, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Bottle leaked in transit....
customer_reviews.text: I've always used Burts Bee shampoo for our dogs. Because of the Corona virus, I decided to order thru Amazon. I recieved the package and opened to find a good 1/4 of the bottle had leaked out. Sad to have to give this product a lower score because of that.....
customer_reviews.author: Marcia C.

customer_reviews.title: Smells funky
customer_reviews.text: The smell this gives off is hard to describe other then funky? Used it once and tossed it.. Still looking for a good shampoo..
customer_reviews.author: DOOGIE

customer_reviews.title: Not the real deal!!! Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely not the real Burt’s Bees shampoo. It was very watery and not anything like the actual product:( Save your money or buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: AC Outz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shampoo, don’t need much
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this pet shampoo. I use it on my little fur baby and it has made her so soft and smell amazing! She hasn’t been itchy or dry skin. It’s nicely concentrated so you don’t need but just a small amount. This is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: b pryor

customer_reviews.title: This is the shampoo to use!
customer_reviews.text: I run a doggie daycare facility and we often wash the pups as a courtesy to our customers. All sorts of different fur coming through these doors but THIS shampoo leaves each one feeling silky and soft with a nice scent! I get asked all the time what we use! It really is great!
customer_reviews.author: Vanya Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Love this dog shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo for my dogs. Scent smells good, lathers well, makes dogs fur super soft. Helps with sensitive skin and allergies
customer_reviews.author: K. Davis

customer_reviews.title: great value, and smell
customer_reviews.text: I buy this all the time for our 1 year old Boston Terrier. She loves her bath, and it does not hurt her eyes, it is a much better price than our local store.
customer_reviews.author: Teril63

customer_reviews.title: She smells worse after her bath.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work and she doesn’t have a skin reaction but this shampoo makes her smell worse after her bath. I won’t be getting it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny J

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo (and the conditioner that goes with it) makes my Golden Doodle's coat really fluffy and soft, while retaining his curls. He's at least twice as cute after his bath now, and I'm not exaggerating. Very noticeable difference between this and whatever I was using before this.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Stella Loves her new shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: Stella, my 70 lb. lab mix is not crazy about taking a shower but once she's lathered up she is fine. She is black and her coat shines beautifully once dry. it's a crazy morning when taking her into the shower ;.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazons Customers

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Grooming and proper shampooing are essential for my cocker spaniel's longer, thicker fur coat. This shampoo, along with its conditioner, provided great results. My dog's fur was easy to brush, smelled great, and was VERY soft. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this oatmeal conditioner because my other bottle of the same exact stuff that I bought from target was running low. And when I switched to this one you can definitely tell it was not the same. The consistency was different, color, and scent.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Best dog shampoo ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo. My dog’s hair is the softest it’s ever been and, with no perfume, it’s no bother to his sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Queenhatchepsut

customer_reviews.title: No odor control whatsoever.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in this. My dog smells terrible after bathing him in it. We’ve never had such bad experience with dog shampoo before! It did nothing to help him smell better, what a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Jona Kristo

customer_reviews.title: TOP PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Quality product at a great price. My dog gets itchy after some shampoos, not this one . It is GREAT!~!!! BIG BOTTLE TOO
customer_reviews.author: rainedeere

customer_reviews.title: Great dog shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: I love this doggy shampoo from Burt's Bees. It makes my dog's fur nice and soft without drying out their skin. I just wish I could get it in the larger bottles but that's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Christian in Florida

customer_reviews.text: We love this shampoo for our pup. Doesn’t leave a residue, good for sensitive skin. Smells nice. Gentle
customer_reviews.author: Monica Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Cheap bottle
customer_reviews.text: Idk about the actual shampoo but I ordered this because I love the brand, when I got it half the bottle was emptied and made a mess. Luckily they put it in a bag so it was easy to pour back in and clean up. 30 minutes later I checked it again and it was a mess again, even with the top closed. Im assuming the bottle is just crap, but that doesnt mean the product isnt. Just feel like I lost some of my money not getting a full bottle
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Leaking bottle, not sealed!
customer_reviews.text: Received bottle leaking from shipment and container does not have a seal to prevent spills or ensure it’s a new product.
customer_reviews.author: george R

customer_reviews.title: Only dog shampoo I'll use
customer_reviews.text: Why they felt they needed extra platic on the bottle and the packaging is ridiculous. But this is the brand i always buy and my dog suffers from the worst allergies and itchy skin. Seems to help the poor itchy pupper. Softest fur after a bath.
customer_reviews.author: corey chewning

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shampoo for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely scent, great for sensitive skin and Leaves fur soft and cuddly - we have a pair of labradoodles and after we wash this two pups, we put in a hair conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: MAG

customer_reviews.title: Mild shampoo for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My dog's skin is pretty sensitive, and tend to be very dry. But, with this product, I can see that his paws are less drier and his coat looks more soft. The smell isn't that agreeable but not bad. Overall, I am satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cook

customer_reviews.title: Makes a Doberman shine!
customer_reviews.text: I used Burt’s Bees for Dogs on my Dobie and my terrier and I was very pleasantly surprised. They both not only had a clean, fresh smell, but the dobie was absolutely glistening! I already ordered another two bottles.
customer_reviews.author: AndreaLor

customer_reviews.title: Leaves dog's coat soft and shiny
customer_reviews.text: I really like using this on my dog. I like that it has a lot of natural ingredients in it so that I'm not using harsh chemicals on my dog's skin. Her coat is always really soft and shiny after washing her with this and her skin isn't dried out.
customer_reviews.author: jj_danger_ranger

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my dog two times so far and it has been great! It keeps his fur soft and clean and has a sweet smell afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Nice coat!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on a whim and my dog’s hair feels fantastic. He gets so many complements on his coat. Plus, the price is not bad and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Bunny

customer_reviews.title: My puppy did great with this but it left his coat less shiny ...
customer_reviews.text: My puppy did great with this but it left his coat less shiny than before I washed him. Other than that it seems gentle and almost unscented so that's good.
customer_reviews.author: S.L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive owners!
customer_reviews.text: My family has sensitivities to scents and most dog shampoos are highly fragranced. I was so happy that my dogs smelled clean without being perfumed. The shampoo is not highly concentrated, but it's affordable enough to make up for that. I will buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda W

customer_reviews.title: Coat looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo. Helped with the excess hair from my dog's shedding. Leaves coat nice and clean ,shiny and smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Use this on our Welsh Corgi, she has sensitive skin, this seems to alleviate her itching problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good.. So far.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good shampoo. I got it for my itchy gsd, it kinda helps but then kinda doesn't so I'm not sure yet. But overall a pretty good shampoo, makes his fur fluffy and soft and smells good. Not a strong smell, just a light mellow smell.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle&Brutus

customer_reviews.title: Best dog shampoo ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best shampoo I’ve ever bought for my dogs. It leaves their skin smooth and their fur like a soft stuffed animal. And it lasts for weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Her fur is soft and plush and easy to comb
customer_reviews.text: My vet reccomnded this for my Shiba Inu puppy as we live in Miami. After 3 weeks I’ve noted the difference between Burt’s and the previous brand I bought. Her fur is soft and plush and easy to comb:) the smell is soft as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Made our dog itch worse. We used it twice, than we through it away. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: WalkerWA

customer_reviews.title: A good quality shampoo at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Good lather and does a great job of washing my dog's coat. He always feel clean afterwards and leaves his hair soft (it's especially noticeable the following day).
customer_reviews.author: Judge Fear

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results !!
customer_reviews.text: I have a extremely allergic Frenchie and this has been the ONLY shampoo I can use on her. She smells great, it’s helped her coat get skinny and best part it’s hypoallergenic. I truly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Valhery

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: this has been the best shampoo and conditioner I have ever used on my chocolate lab
customer_reviews.author: T. Hamar

customer_reviews.title: Seems gentle
customer_reviews.text: Not too scented, gets the dog clean and rinses out easily.
customer_reviews.author: K. Adams

customer_reviews.title: I do love that its all natural though
customer_reviews.text: My dogs skin was getting very itchy from the dry heat in the winter months. Its helps temporarily, doesn't have much of a smell. I do love that its all natural though.
customer_reviews.author: Tlynn28

customer_reviews.title: Clean Happy Dog!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great choice for you dog's bath time. Burt's Bees is known for quality and natural ingredients, and shows proof in this pet shampoo. Cleans well and smells good too!. Love the oatmeal!
customer_reviews.author: a. vegan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo for my dogs. It's great for sensitive skin and doesn't have a strong perfume smell. My dogs aren't rolling around after a bath trying to run the smell off.
customer_reviews.author: mcguigcl

customer_reviews.title: It does the job.
customer_reviews.text: The smell is very feint but it left our dog's coat pretty soft. It's good for what it is and recommended if you want something with no to minimal scent.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Lim

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo for the puppers. Smells good and he is so soft after. Though he is already super soft for a dog.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Harry Dog smells good
customer_reviews.text: Fluffy little pekinese picks up all kinds of hitchhikers when we go out for walks (grass, bark dust, twigs) and it doesn't all come out with a brushing. This gets him sparkly clean and he smells really good. We like it.
customer_reviews.author: Deby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this shampoo I use to wash my Irish Setters feet daily and rinses clean with no add perfumes
customer_reviews.author: snoopy

customer_reviews.title: No good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My dog is super allergic to it. He had blood holes like chemical burns on his skin all over. For the first two washes I didn’t realize what’s causing it and it happens twice. All of his whole body. On the third time I finally linked the cause and gave him a clean water bath and he is good now.
customer_reviews.author: Ping He

customer_reviews.title: Not for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: It smells good, cleans well, makes my dog’s coat shiny and soft, but did not help with her dry, sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Did the job - I would order 2 at a time if you have a larger dog like the one on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best shampoo you can purchase leaves my dog coat shiney and doesn’t dry out her skin. I also purchase the Burt’t Bee conditioner as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nolaninc

customer_reviews.title: Nice Price, but cap not secure in shipping
customer_reviews.text: I received my order timely; unfortunately, the cap was not secure and there was shampoo leaking into the box with my other purchases.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Should of look at reviews!
customer_reviews.text: Not sealed! Horrible buy! I bought burt Bees before and was not watery like this one I bought on here..
customer_reviews.author: Brina

customer_reviews.title: Leaked in transit
customer_reviews.text: I'll do my best to update once I've tried the product. Just wanted to give a heads up, probably 2 or 3 ounces of the bottle leaked in transit. The cap appears to have loosened up.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff for our boy
customer_reviews.text: Our dog itched quite a bit with the previous shampoo we washed him with. This one, not at all. Yea!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Coat feels great would like a little more fresh smell almost odorless when rinsed. But skin and coat maintenance outweigh lack of a little scent.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Seal missing
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come sealed from the vendor I purchased from. Be aware of what you put on your dogs, if it’s not sealed don’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary H.

customer_reviews.title: My wet dog smells better before the bath
customer_reviews.text: Scent of the shampoo is of a wet dog. My wet dog smells better before the bath.
customer_reviews.author: Jullus&Courtney Perez

product_meta.title: Burt's Bees for Dogs Natural Oatmeal Conditioner with Colloidal Oat Flour and Honey | Puppy and Dog Shampoo
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Pack| Style:Shampoo (16oz)Burt's Bees has been a pioneer in developing nature-friendly health and beauty care products for over thirty years. We believe that pets are family, so we're bringing the same natural attention and care to your closest furry friends. Burt's Bees Natural Pet Care now brings nature's solutions to our beloved pets with a specially formulated line of natural grooming products including shampoos, conditioner, sprays, wipes, and treatments. Burt's Bees Natural Pet Care products are made using 80% post-consumer recycled bottles. Tap into nature's powers with Burt's Bees Oatmeal Shampoo for Dogs made with Colloidal Oat Flour & Honey to help nourish dogs with dry itchy skin or as to maintain a regular bathing routine. Our gentle formula naturally cleanses your pet’s skin and coat with without any harmful chemicals that make your pet’s coat dry and dull. This formula is made with skin-moisturizing colloidal oat flour, shine-boosting honey, and nourishing green tea extract for a clean that shows! As is typical with natural formulas, this shampoo will only have a light lather and doesn’t have a strong scent outside of the main ingredients as we don’t add in artificial fragrances to any of our products. Burt's Bees Natural Pet Care is made in the USA. Discover nature’s best for your pets! Directions: Shake the bottle up before every use. Apply shampoo liberally to your dog's wet coat. Work from head to tail, while carefully avoiding eyes. Work in and rinse thoroughly. Store in a cool, dry place. Ingredients: Water, Coco Betaine, Coco Glucoside, Glyceryl Oleate, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Camelia sinensis (Green Tea) extract, Colloidal Oatmeal, Honey, Beeswax, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate. Safety Warning: For external use only. In case of contact with eyes, flush thoroughly with water. Keep out of reach of children and pets to avoid possible consumption. Will not wash off topical flea & tick treatment when following treatment manufacturer's directions.

BRAND_DESCRIPTION
Burt's Bees for Dogs
feature_bullets: SOOTHES AND SOFTENS — Burt's Bees Oatmeal Shampoo cleans, soothes, softens, and conditions your dog's dry skin and coat
MADE WITH THE HIGHEST QUALITY INGREDIENTS — This gentle formula includes ingredients like colloidal oatmeal, honey, and beeswax for sensitive skin
DIRECTIONS — Apply to dog's wet coat. Work from head to tail and rinse, carefully avoiding eyes. As is typical with natural formulas, this shampoo will only have a light lather
SUITABLE FOR ALL DOGS AND PUPPIES — This mild tearless shampoo is pH balanced especially for all dogs and puppies
100% SAFE — Veterinarian recommended formula, free of fragrances, sulfates, colorants, and harsh chemicals
